intro: Conchograecum egertonii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to eastern Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its vibrant, tubular flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant has heart-shaped leaves that are typically velvety in texture.
